output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to the given criteria:
1. Has CMF: Yes, the post contains "CMF: 11240017" which indicates it's electoral propaganda
2. Refers to candidate: Yes, mentions "Marcel Ciolacu" who is a presidential candidate (Position 3)
3. Addresses wide population: Yes - It's a paid Facebook/Instagram post with significant reach (15,000-19,999 impressions) - Targets a general audience in Maramureș - Spent 300-399 RON on promotion
4. Electoral objective: Yes - Promotes PSD's parliamentary team - Specifically mentions Marcel Ciolacu and his plan - Uses electoral slogans ("Calea sigură pentru România!") - Clearly aims to influence voting behavior
5. Journalism: No - This is clearly a campaign message, not journalistic content - Contains political promotion and campaign messaging
6. Personal opinion: No - This is an official party communication (PSD Maramureș) - Contains structured campaign messaging - Has CMF number

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This constitutes electoral propaganda because: - Official party communication with CMF number - Promotes both parliamentary and presidential candidates - Paid distribution on social media - Clear electoral messaging and call to action - References to presidential candidate Marcel Ciolacu
conclusion.message-for-police: PSD Maramures, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin promovarea unui mesaj electoral platit (ID: 620276456991285) ce face referire directă la candidatul prezidențial Marcel Ciolacu, după încheierea perioadei de campanie electorală. Postarea, având CMF 11240017, a fost distribuită pe Facebook și Instagram cu un buget între 300-399 RON, atingând între 15.000-19.999 de persoane, promovând explicit mesaje electorale și planul de măsuri al candidatului, după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, încălcând astfel prevederile legale privind încheierea campaniei electorale.
